content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseDeltaFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseDeltaFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = Delta)
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'project3_bootcampadls1_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [project3_bootcampadls1_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION = 'abfss://project3@bootcampadls1.dfs.core.windows.net' 
	)
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.loyalty (
	[LoyaltyID] smallint,
	[DateTime] datetime2(7),
	[PointsChange] smallint,
	[Reason] nvarchar(4000)
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'sliver/LoyaltyTranscations/',
	DATA_SOURCE = [project3_bootcampadls1_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseDeltaFormat]
	)
GO


SELECT TOP 100 * FROM dbo.loyalty
GO
